projects.title: Portfolio-v2
projects.description: This is this portfolio website, built with Nuxt 3 and TypeScript. It showcases my skills, projects, and experiences. It is designed to be responsive and user-friendly. I implemented a chatbot with a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architecture to answer questions about me.

projects.title: SnakeAI
projects.description: The goal of this project is to introduce basic of reinforcement learning with a snake game. The snake has to reach a minimum length of 10.

projects.title: Gomoku
projects.description: The goal of this project is to make an AI capable of beating human players at Gomoku.
